text: oh inu anthu okhulupirira! Mverani Mulungu ndipo mverani Mtumwi wake ndiponso iwo amene ali ndi udindo pakati panu. Ndipo ngati mutsutsana pa chinthu china chilichonse, chiperekeni icho kwa Mulungu ndi Mtumwi wake ngati inu mumakhulupirira mwa Mulungu ndi tsiku lomaliza. Zimenezi zidzakhala zabwino ndi zolungama pomaliza
